moa.classifiers.bayes

Class AmidstRegressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • moa.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
          • moa.classifiers.bayes.AmidstRegressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, moa.classifiers.Classifier, moa.classifiers.Regressor, moa.gui.AWTRenderable, moa.MOAObject, moa.options.OptionHandler

    public class AmidstRegressor
extends moa.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements moa.classifiers.Regressor
    This class extends the AbstractClassifier and defines the AMIDST Regressor that could be run using the MOAâ€™s graphical user interface. MOA (Massive Online Analysis) is an open source software available at http://moa.cms.waikato.ac.nz
    See Also:

        public moa.options.IntOption batchSizeOption
        Creates a new object of the class IntOption. Specifies the size of the batch used for learning this AmidstRegressor.

      • parallelModeOption

        public moa.options.FlagOption parallelModeOption
        Creates a new object of the class FlagOption. Specifies whether the parallel mode is used for this AmidstRegressor learning process.
